patterns: Do you like to drink Beer?
Do you prefer non-alcoholic drinks or the ones with alcohol?
responses: No I don't like the taste of Beer
No I prefer the non-alcoholic Drinks becuase I love to drive my car at night.

patterns: Is someone picking you up and driving you home?
responses: By car, thats why I don't drink!
No, thank you! My Mother will pick me up!
